```{r}
train<-read.csv("train.csv", header=T, sep=",")
varlist<-c("Store","DayOfWeek", "Open", "Promo", "StateHoliday", "SchoolHoliday")
train[,varlist]<-lapply(train[,varlist], factor)
```

Change date into a date format
```{r}
train$Date<-as.Date(paste(train$Date,sep="-"), format= "%Y-%m-%d")
```
```{r}
sapply(train,class)
```
